head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEAHY, WILLIAM F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEAHY, WILLIAM F.

block.p: LEAHY-William F. On Saturday, September 2, 2000, of Sag Harbor, NY, and Boca Raton, FL. Beloved husband of the late Catherine (nee Carlin). Dear father of William C. and Michael J. Leahy. Loving grandfather of William G., Michael J. Jr., Lorraine Winsor and Christa. Also survived by eight greatgrandchildren. Mr. Leahy was retired from Met Life after 46 years of service. Served in Army Air Corps from 1940-1945, retiring as a lieutenant colonel. The family will receive friends Tuesday, 2-4:30 and 7-9:30 PM, at Cecere Funeral Homes, 356 Westbury Ave, Carle Place. Funeral Mass Wednesday, 11 AM, at Queen of the Most Holy Rosary R.C. Church, Bridgehampton. Interment following at Sacred Hearts Cemetery, Southampton. The family suggests donations to St. Andrew's North Scholarship Fund, 6152 North Verde Trail, Boca Raton, FL 33433.
